subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dan Boyle had three goals and an assist during a four-goal third period, rallying the host Tampa Bay Lightning to a 4-3 victory over the slumping Rangers on Saturday night.
snippet: Dan Boyle had three goals and an assist during a four-goal third period, rallying the host Tampa Bay Lightning to a 4-3 victory over the slumping Rangers on Saturday night.
